name: Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?!
summary: Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?! is a wacky simulation game where you manage your very own weapon shop and expand its business across an incredible potato world. Use your potato smiths to forge weapons and sell them to questing heroes.
info:
• 中文名: 神圣土豆！武器店？！
  • 游戏类型: 模拟经营
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: 13 Jul, 2015
  • 售价: $14.99
  • 官方网站: http://www.day-lightstudios.com/games/holy-potatoes-weapon-shop/
  • 游戏开发: Daylight Studios
  • 游戏发行: Daylight Studios
